38838023.review:
Trick & Treat is a short but fun little rpg maker game. Okay now for the story.

You play as Amelia a young maid going trick or treating with her mistress, a young witch named Charlotte.
As they walk Charlotte says there is a cursed mansion she would like to go and play treats on, but once there Charlotte runs off and it’s up to Amelia to find her.

Now what I liked about this game, Story was nice and sweet. That’s all I am saying on that. Liked the cute art and the art book/dlc for the games. 

Characters were likable and funny. Liked that this game was spooky but not like scary the hell out of you, really this game is for all ages, and that’s not a bad thing.

Now what I did not like, It was a bit too short; puzzles could be a bit of a pain but really that’s all to me what was wrong with it.

So I say get this game it’s a classic spooky rpg maker game, with cute art, a nice story, and likable and funny Characters and its free but I say get the art book/dlc with it. It gives more insight to the Characters.

PROS

CONS

SPOILER PART

4. No feelings towards the witch and the other butler. I'm like "huh, GTFO".
5. The vampire also belittle my pumpkin girl at the Extra play. "huh, GTFO".

STILL A MYSTERY TO ME

P/S: WILL DIE FOR MY PUMPKIN GIRL.

时长：这是我入坑单机的第一个游戏……花了一晚上通关。
类型：一款有剧情、探索解谜向的像素小游戏，很适合新手探索自己游戏喜好。
过程：新手小白第一次玩出来的不是真结局……一看就感觉不太对，然后去攻略了真结局，换了一个结局前的存档玩出了真结局，才发现8个成就我还是借助攻略解锁了唯一一个真结局的成就。 其实说实话从攻略看，全成就不难，只是自己没有找支线的敏感度所以完美错过拿成就的部分。
故事：偏童话故事风的小剧情？ 有点暗黑有点恶搞，像素风还是蛮萌的哈哈~ ~ 真结局也萌萌的~ 
然后觉得单机游戏真的蛮不错的，可以随时存档随时控制游戏时间，还有各种小故事听~
从此一发不可收拾一个月左右在各游戏平台入了十几个游戏 T_T

超级赞的恐怖解谜rpg，免费且完成度极高，成就和相册满足收集癖(不过相册要二周目真结局才开)，强烈推荐万圣节的时候玩!(我其实之前就打算万圣节玩的，结果一不小心拖太久了orz)
剧情大概就是女巫带着她的南瓜小伙伴万圣节晚上去古堡探险的故事，吓你一跳的要素也做的很棒，最后当然是trick or treat的happy ending啦!除了死亡结局外还有真结局、普通结局和坏结局。分歧点为终点的房间是否选择支持(支持则真结局，反之普通结局)，以及女巫有没有在限定时间内和王子汇合(未在时限内到达即为坏结局)。
流程不长，大概1～2小时可以通关。【不过由于我强迫症，每次都要把所有东西点一遍，玩起rpg来总是要花很久(⋟﹏⋞)
听说制作组出了新游?考虑入手。尤其是中文的解谜类rpg实在是太少了，所以有种淘到了好物的感觉啊!(◦˙▽˙◦)

36547814.review:
通关了一周目，全成就，想想还很激动呢。游戏本身的难度不大，很萌很治愈，就是音效有点恐怖。
操作呢，上下左右动弹，Z或者空格互动，ESC或者X背包，X也可以在输入谜题时将输错的或者多余的文字删掉。Shift加速跑，不过没有追逐战，只有时间限制。
切记别下意识截图F12，直接回到主菜单...
内容上讲呢，一个国产良心免费游戏这样已经很棒棒了，2个小时左右的游戏内容，没什么令人惊吓的地方，[spoiler] 是像我这样的nonke也能安心玩耍的万圣节题材游戏 [/spoiler]。不过我就不剧透了，首先一个这样一个很萌很可爱的游戏我觉得我没什么剧透的必要，第二是已经有很多的先辈在做了。[strike] 其实是我比较懒而已... [/strike]
玩了两个小时通关并没有给我一种身心俱疲的感觉，谜题还是很简单的，有些可以暴力破解。[spoiler] SL大法好! [/spoiler]
倒是真结局+全成就后给我一种难以言明的满足...
制作组出了个组合包，我觉得等圣诞节的时候有买的必要。
[spoiler] XGN:9/10 [/spoiler]

36423429.review:
Trick & Treat - небольшой хэллоуинский квест на RPG Maker`е.

[i]Trick-or-treating - хеллоуинский обычай, в котором дети наряженные в монстров, ходят по домам и выпрашивают сладости. Распространен в англоязычных странах и Мексике.[/i]

[h1]Сюжет.[/h1]
Игра поведает нам историю Амелии, тыквы-служанки у ведьмочки Шарлотты, отправившихся в отдаленный замок, дабы посмотреть как в нём проводят Хэллоуин. История в игре простенькая, во многом юморная, и построена на стебе над всеми возможными клише - от мрачного замка, с хмурым дворецким, до вампира-вегетарианца, от доброй колдуньи, до чудовища которое может расколдовать только любовь. 

[h1]Геймплей.[/h1]
Несмотря на то что игра на RPG Maker`е, это квест с паззлами. Загадок много, большая часть на внимательность. Есть момент с поискам всех нужных сладостей и бочек для разбивания, за него дают ачивки. В игре 2 основные концовки, и 9 вариантов смерти. Геймплей достаточно хороший.

[h1]Графика и звуки.[/h1]
Все как на RPG Maker`е, плюс милые, наивные Paint`овские рисунки. Музыка неплохая.

[h1]Как итог.[/h1]
Неплохой хэллоуинский квест. Тем кому хочется сыграть в веселую игру про страшные ужасти, тем кто любит стеб над клише из книг ужасов, и просто любителям хороших квестов, пройти стоит.
8 фонтанов с кетчупом из 10

36202293.review:
This was a really cute rpgmaker game for Halloween that I played this year and I really enjoyed it!
Story
8/10
The story wasn't anything extremely special, but it was very short and sweet. The characters were all very cute and the small story felt interesting and decently written.
Art
9/10
All the sprites and character portraits were very well designed and everything had a very cute Halloween feel
Sound
7/10
The music and sounds were good but pretty average and nothing too special but still appealing.
Gameplay
8/10
This is your typical rpgmaker puzzle game, with decently easy to solve puzzles, however one point I got stuck but I just looked up a walkthrough, however I probably got stuck due to my bad puzzle solving skills lol. But overall the puzzles were fun and not to challenging. 
Overall 8/10
I recommend this game to play around Halloween since it's made for that time of year, but I feel you can play it anytime of the year. It was a very cute and enjoyable experience, and the jumpscares were not very scary and there were not very many so if you're worried about them don't be. This game was a great and it's FREE so give it a go.

36189103.review:
[h1]Summary[/h1] 
Not recommended if you're looking for a creepy horror RPG with a disturbing story. The game is cute, but definitely not scary. Also not recommending the game due to issues with the Steam achievements.

If you don't care about either of those things and are looking for a free puzzle game, try it. [i]Trick & Treat[/i] isn’t nearly as challenging as most horror RPGs, but it has a decent plot and some nice puzzles.

[b]In the end, whether you decide to play it or not really depends on what you look for in a game like this. It’s a free game, so you can always try if you’re not sure. Since I’ve played a lot of horror RPGs in the past, this game wasn’t a challenge for me, but it might be if you’re not familiar with similar games.[/b]

[h1]Full review[/h1]
I don’t really get why this is tagged as "horror", because it isn’t scary at all. There are maybe 1 or 2 malicious characters in the game, jumpscares that aren't jumpscares, and just a handful of bad endings. The summary on the store page mentions "many deaths", but that is an exaggeration. If you've played other horror RPGs like [i]Mad Father[/i], [i]The Witch's House[/i] or [i]Ib[/i], this game is a breeze.

I'm not saying [i]Trick & Treat[/i] is a bad game. It's actually quite fun for a puzzle RPG, with some pretty diverse puzzles and should keep you busy for around 2-3 hours. For a horror RPG, however, it is disappointing. Just because the game is about halloween and has some bad endings doesn't make it a horror game.

There are some issues with the achievement system. It often occurs that achievements aren't unlocked even if you've done everything you're supposed to. Check the discussions in the community hub if you don’t believe me.

If you're lucky, you can get all of the achievements in one run. I had to replay the game 4 times before I got the "Candy" achievement, because it just wouldn't unlock while I [b]did[/b] collect everything. Even clearing the game data and reinstalling the game after every run didn't seem to help. Then, at the end of the 4th replay, when I was about to give up on it, the achievement suddenly unlocked. Strange. All I can say is: the achievement system is unstable, and some players appear to have more luck than others. Not saying it's necessarily the developer's fault, but it [b]is[/b] frustrating.

There's an additional outfit that can be unlocked and equipped on the next playthrough, but honestly I don't see any reason to replay the game other than to get achievements you've missed- and even then, there's a chance you'll have to delete the game data, so you won't have the outfit anymore. Once you've seen the "true ending", the other endings really add nothing to the story.

36180213.review:
Trick & Treat is a very cute, yet short game. It's not the spooktacular game that most people would thing of when playing a halloween game, although some light horror elements are present (and I do mean light). 

You play as Amelia, the maid of the young Charlotte, as the two of them attend a dinner party at a mansion deep in the woods. However Amelia and Charlotte quickly get separated from one another, with Amelia desperate to find her. Though it's ultimately story driven, much of the game is presented via logic puzzels. Each room is a riddle, and finding the answer allows you to progress. Some puzzles are even optional, but give more lore to the game if completed.

The main bulk of the game's story, sadly, is locked behind optional rooms -- with one even requiring you to beat the game before accessing -- but most of that is background information that isn't required to understand the game's story.

For a free to play RPG Maker game, I actually rather enjoyed it. I recommend the game to anyone who is looking for a cute game they can blow an hour or two on any night they feel like being spooky, without necessarily being scary or needing skeletons.

35960594.review:
An overall good game! It's pretty short; I beat it in only two hours.

The game focuses on puzzles and they are actually pretty interesting and unique. I was stumped for a while on some of them. The game doesn't hold your hand and just tell you the answers either, but hints to you through enviromental clues. The fact that you have to explore and find things yourself, with no real hint to where some things are is refreshing too. YOU have to figure it out.

As for the genre, horror doesn't really nail it. There are horror elements in the game, sure, but I never really felt scared or have jumped at anything in this game. It's much more of a casual puzzle game where you can die in some cases. If you get scared by minor things like sudden pictures of not-so-scary things, then this game might scare you. It's a nice halloween game.

The music was fitting and gave the game an air of unease. The tracks fit where they were implemented, but I did go out and then back in to an area and the music dissapeared. Not sure if that was intended.

The plot was lacking; there was a story, but it didn't have much substance. If you are looking for something that has a lot of plot, this isn't the game for you to play, but this is a puzzle game, so it doesn't really need plot to be fun. As for the characters, they are kinda flat and baseless, but again, this game doesn't focus on that. There are a few unexpected plot twists at the end.

As for me, I enjoyed the game, as short as it was, and got the true ending on first play. It wasn't too hard, in the sense that dying is very easy to avoid if you pay attention to hints.

Personally I'd give this game a 6/10. It was short and sweet, fits the halloween vibe that it was going for, and has good puzzles. There are also extras you can unlock if you play again and get the true ending a second time, but that's for another time. I'll probably get back to this game again soon.

Trick & Treat is a sweet little game to play if you've got a couple free hours on your hands. 
It's not extremely story heavy but it doesn't have to be because it offers you something else in exchange: It offers an experience. One I really enjoyed and don't get very often from games. 

That being said, obviously, this game isn't for everyone. 
Like I stated before it's not story heavy and it's not filled to the brim with jumpscares.
 
If you're a hardcore horror fan, coming into this thinking it will be the next Mad Father then you will be disappointed and I would recommend you give this a miss but If you're like me and you were just browsing, looking for a fun little game to play, give it a go. 

If you go in, not comparing it to anything and you're just simply there to play, I think you'll be pleasantly surprised like I was.

[quote=Википедиа]Компьютерная ролевая игра (англ. Computer Role-Playing Game, обозначается аббревиатурой CRPG или RPG) — жанр компьютерных игр, основанный на элементах игрового процесса традиционных настольных ролевых игр. В ролевой игре игрок управляет одним или несколькими персонажами, каждый из которых описан набором численных характеристик, списком способностей и умений; примерами таких характеристик могут быть хит-пойнты (англ. hit points, HP), показатели силы, ловкости, защиты, уклонения, уровень развития того или иного навыка и т. п. В ходе игры они могут меняться. Одним из характерных элементов игрового процесса является повышение возможностей персонажей за счёт улучшения их параметров и изучения новых способностей.[/quote]
"Trick & Treat" - это не РПГ игра, хотя она основана на движке "RPG Maker", если бы в метках разработчики это не написали, то честно и не догадался. Игра появилась в Стиме, ровно год назад, видимо, ко дню "Хеллоуина", который отмечается в Америке 1 ноября. Несмотря на то, что игра бесплатная, она выполнена на профессиональном уровне. Сюжет игры, повествует о приключении двух девушек, которые отправились, собирать сладости, и забрели в отчуждённый замок. Войдя в помещение, одна из девушек пропала, а другая не растерялась и начала поиски своей подруги, бродя по замку. Стиль игры - приключение и решение задач или головоломок, у персонажа нет прокачки, но есть инвентарь. Сохранять игру нам позволяется, только в определённых точках, зато их много, потому что и опасных моментов не мало, с кровавым исходом! Отмечу ещё и то, что игра полностью на английском языке, читать придется много, не считая того, чтобы понять смысл головоломок - язык надо знать отлично. Мне, лично, помогло руководство в сообществе данной игры, правда, тоже на английском языке, но автор стряпал статью, на базовой основе знаний языка и понять, то что было написано, не составляло большого труда.

34701220.review:
“Сладость или гадость?”

Эта игра рассказывает нам историю о том, как ведьма и ее ученица пошли собирать конфеты по городу, но по пути в город ученица пожаловалась на то, что ее пугают страшные рожицы на тыквах, а ведь они как раз шли в их самый эпицентр т.е. город, надо было что-то делать и выручать верную подругу…

Ведьма предложила сгонять в местный проклятый замок - сказано, сделано и наши герои уже гордо шагали по липкому красному ковру в прихожей замка, где их аккурат встретил местный граф Дракула, после недолгого разговора ведьма погналась за хозяином замка, дабы он пояснил за базар.

И вот наша героиня осталась одна, начав бродить по замку полным ловушек и врагов в поисках своей подруги.

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=796040266

Не нужно быть гением чтобы понять отсылки внутри игры, да чего далеко ходить - вон в самом начале замка на стеллажах красуются надписи на книгах: “Дракула”, “Призрак Оперы”, “Алиса в стране чудес” - отсылки на них проходят на протяжении всей игры. Отсылки забавные и их много, есть даже целый персонаж с точно такой же маской, как и у призрака оперы.

Игра выглядит очень мило, по крайней мере персонажи точно, чуть другая ситуация обстоит с одноразовыми рисунками на скриптах (в том числе и с местными скримерами), так большая часть из них нарисованы акварелью, что тоже мило, но со страшными вещами это почти не работает, можно сказать даже, что тут вообще нету хоррор элемента.

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=796040062

Как и RPG элемента тоже, тут нету никакой прокачки, поднятия в уровнях, зелий лечения, пошаговых драк, разве что зелье маны одно на всю игру валяется, да и то, сделано оно для забавной насмешки, а не для какого-то серьезного дела.

Зато есть милая графика, интересные головоломки, не сложные ачивки, короткость самой игры, что с легкость компенсирует простоту в технической стороне, ведь игра сделана на RPG maker XV.

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=796040305

Конечно игре в целом, до какой-нибудь Mogeko Castle далеко, но головоломки с поиском убийцы, различные “успей за определенное время”, выбери роль с куклами, а также набор кодовых слов вручную при помощи смекалочки - делают свое дело и в игру интересно играть до самого конца. 

+Выбор правильного ответа в головоломках
+Забеги на скорость
+Милая
+Юмор и сюжет

- Это практически не хоррор (хотя на главной стима написано обратное)
- Это не РПГ 

9 из 10

Кураторская группа: http://steamcommunity.com/groups/IKCB

33402820.review:
This game was awesome! The aesthetic was a nice blend of spooky and cutely petite, and the art was very pleasing with different styles for different situations. The game itself was also very good, and I liked the idea of the rooms switching from clean and perfect to bloody messes depending on the situation. I also appreciated the attention to detail with all of the furniture and objects in the house, too; some of them do weird and cool things. The deaths are also spooky, and it's fun trying to figure out all the ways you can die in this game. Exploring the whole house is definitely worth it.
The plot is not too in-depth, but it's not meant to be. It's a nice game you can complete in an hour or two, and there are fun puzzles and things to figure out as you try to solve the mysteries of the house. I've actually replayed it a few times, and each runthrough is enjoyable. It's great unless you don't like creepy dolls. ;)

33323011.review:
Such an enjoyable little free-to-play game, I would have happily paid for the experience! Unlike other games who merely put on a cutesy face in order to hide more highly disturbing aspects underneath, Trick n' Treat is a pure lighthearted romp through and through. I love that about it, especially since I have two daughters who are just starting to get into playing "scary" games, and it was absolutely perfect for them. (my youngest especially loved the fact that one of the main characters, Amelia, had the same name as her). I wouldn't classify this as a horror game per se, but more a mystery adventure game with spooky thematic elements. 

The art is adorable in its clean simplicity, the characters are likable, the music helps set the mood and the writing is sure to make you giggle. There's plenty of candy to collect and rooms to explore. I found all the puzzles to be very original and have just the right amount of difficulty; not impossible but definitely will require some creative thinking. I enjoyed this so much and found the story/characters so interesting that I have already begun playing the demo for the prequel, The Witches Tea Party. Can't wait to see more of the colorful and magical world the dev has created!

31674320.review:
I highly recommend this game! I'm so glad I played it!

Not the longest, but for a lil ol pixel free-to-play, I didn't expect much of anything else! A good way to spend one or two hours, and does actually have some replay value! (There are at least three Full Ends to the game, and an optional outfit for the protagonist after the first runthrough!)

Not much in the way of horror, but it does have some minor spooks in there! Perfect for people who love these kinds of games but can't handle chases nor jumpscares (aka myself)!

This game also has a very endearing sense of humour! It mixes adorable pixel characters, a minorly spooky atmosphere and humour very well!

I am incredibly excited for the release of The Witch's Tea Party, a prequel to this game featuring the childhood of the lovely Miss Charlotte! (And psst! The demo's out now! Check it out!)

Basically, in summation: I love this game and definitely recommend it! And hey, if you don't like it, the only thing you have to lose is your precious time; not your precious dollars!

Thanks!

- BlazingLegend

31149857.review:
[h1]一段惊奇而轻松的旅程[/h1]

这是一款麻雀虽小五脏俱全的解谜游戏。
恰到好处的解谜，恰到好处的音效，恰到好处的收集要素，连“二周目新元素”这种东西居然也具备。
好似涂鸦的CG，虽然简单，但是很符合游戏的气氛。
而该细致的那些地方——人物的表情，环境的布置——都很细致。
一些场景中的小机关，比如随着人物行动而时隐时现的幽灵，甚至整个都会发生变换的房屋，也都很有[strike]恶[/strike]趣味。这些东西实现起来挺花心思的，但是制作者愿意在这些地方花心思，体现出了足够的诚意！
剧情方面，典故用得恰到好处，true end也具备一定的幽默感。
游戏流程不长，大概两小时之内怎么都能通关了，刚刚好适合做直播。
成就的获得也不算困难。
虽然流程不长，剧情简短，但是，在这个随便制作一个渣游戏就能四处骗钱的年代，还有什么比免费的东西更良心呢！
何况我的小阿梅利亚实在是很可爱哇。

30999296.review:
Trick & Treat was one of the games that popped up on my Steam recommendations and thought I'd try it. I actually just finished playing another game with a similar theme (cute/horror) and got curious with this one when I came across it. Plus, the reviews are really good. I'm glad I tried Trick & Treat because I really enjoyed it.

What I liked about the game is the story, the mood of the game, and that the puzzles aren't too difficult to figure out. I can sometimes be lazy with puzzles and would resort to walkthroughs when I'm stuck but I didn't with this one. Just went with trial and error if I got stumped. The game is also quite short, making it a bit easy to do several playthroughs in order to see the different endings and get all the achievements. I was eager to complete the game that I slept late just to finish it.

In terms of cons, some players may not like that the game is short. Also, though the art is cute and nice, some bits could be a bit better. (However, if you've seen the extra [sketches], they're beautiful.)

I'd say give this game a try. It's good and, hey, it's free. ^_^

I would definitely recommend this. You don't even have to play it on Halloween.

Very charming game, packed with the usual cuteness that cheery-fun-short adventures like these consist of. 

None of the jumpscares are particularly scary(in my opinion of course, but it's game that's clearly trying to have fun and not be too scary). 

The puzzles are simple. 

The story is simple and amusingly goofy.

Music was fitting and fun.

Two downsides I can point out personally. One, lack of direction if you get lost but there's no shame in looking for a walkthrough(steam guides section) and two, it's VERY short. About 1 1/2 hours.

Going to look into playing their other game The Witches Tea Party which looks pretty interesting. This developers seems like they're worth following. This game gave me similar vibes to The Albino Hunter's background/developers.

30479513.review:
Trick & Treat Review - Raymond KT

Summary: A young witch named Charlotte and her maid Amelia went trick or treating on the Halloween Eve, and somehow they decided to visit a cursed mansion.

Before Amelia could figure out anything, she was on her own in this huge, ominous house. Dance with the ghosts, play with the dolls, and hopefully, she can uncover the dark past of the house and see Miss Charlotte again.
You'll play as Amelia the Pumpkin Maid. It's about exploring and solving puzzles in a spooky atmosphere. There will be some horror elements, romance, many deaths (bad ends) and a happy ending of true love.

We play most of the story as Amelia as we go from room to room solving basic puzzles, item puzzles and possibly dying. I can't say that death comes harshly at any point because all the puzzles are relatively easy. What killed me most often was just checking objects which I knew better than to check (like standing on the gallows) but I'd just saved a moment prior and figured meh, why not. The only puzzle with any real difficulty (assigning the dolls) has no game over element. Not that death is a bad thing here. There are several Dead Ends to collect, featuring a short scene, a death title, and a basic CG.

Trick and Treat also has a robust amount of replay value. With multiple endings, unlockables in the bonus room, a cute extra costume for Amelia, some additional dialogue and a slot machine-esque minigame you're not likely to stop after just one go. If I were to wish for anything it'd be a new room and puzzle or two when going for True End on a clear save (I saw a room that I could never get into so maybe I just missed it). I also wish you could see a textless version of the bonus art since it looked fantastic. Even better than what's in the rest of the game. Of course going through the game a second time you blast right through it with no hang-ups.

29781109.review:
最一開始看到遊戲提醒有突發式驚嚇等等的時候，原本懷疑這是一款萌皮黑骨的遊戲(好比魔女之家之類的XDD)，不過實際走過一輪之後，發現他其實十分溫馨治癒~劇情上雖然只是一個簡單的故事，但是知道整件事的始末之後還是會令人會心一笑，是個很棒的體驗。
遊戲過程上做得也很好，整體算十分流暢，沒有難得無法解出的謎題，不論是想看TE還是NE都可以不用靠攻略就刷出。(8個成就裡有7個可以在一周目就刷出來)個人在玩的時候除了找餐廳鑰匙那邊卡了一段時間(感覺不是很明顯啊...)和Riddle Room的開門密碼(原諒我不是很會解英文的謎語QQ)外，其他部分沒有碰到卡關卡很久的狀況；而遊戲中也沒有真的很嚇人的內容(頂多偶爾有個血手印之類的)，大部分的玩家都可以放心食用。
如果真要說有沒有什麼怪怪的地方，大概就是有些對話框裡顯現的內容會使用紅字，但是並不是所有紅字都會影響到劇情發展或解謎過程。也許是為了增加恐怖的感覺，但這樣會讓人懷疑是不是錯過了什麼劇情之類的啦~個人比較在意的是在廚房的"Cask of Amontillado"是紅字，到地下室第一次遇到小丑的時候他好像也說了同樣的內容，但是去找了那些桶子卻好像沒發現什麼問題...(也許是為了增添恐怖感?)另外還有在監獄那邊那個說Help me的人，他是誰?為什麼在那裡?要如何救他?不過因為他和主要劇情上並沒有相關性，所以猜測大概是為了增加懸疑性之類的。
CG圖很可愛，音樂也很不錯(推Hidden Room的BGM~)，不會花太多時間，裡面使用得英文幾乎都不難，縱使有不會的部分只要稍微查一下字典就可以了。整體是一款玩起來很享受的遊戲，希望有更多人能體驗看看~(・ω・)b

29498849.review:
As an adult, this game is a thoroughly enjoyable 90 minutes or so, more if you decide to replay for the different endings and that final achievement.  I think what really shines, though, is that it fills a niche that's very difficult to fit into--horror game for younger gamers that doesn't feel childish or pandering.  There are a few jumpscares and a generally spooky atmosphere, but, as it describes, in a lighthearted way.  I was easily scared as a kid, and this hearkens back to the days of testing the waters of horror, thrilling but "safe" and fun.  It realls gets the true meaning of Halloween: EVERYONE should be able to have fun.

tl;dr perfect for a slow October evening, even better if you're playing with a tad you love.  And with the price tag, you literally can't go wrong.

29169026.review:
Recientemente termino este juego y debo de decir que me sorprendió mucho y supero mis expectativas. Hace mucho tiempo no jugaba a un juego con temática RPG porque ya no son como antes; Luego me encuentro con este juego y decidí darle una oportunidad para ver de que trataba y ¡bam!; Me atrapo y de lo que me di cuenta es que el término "RPG" solo es en el aspecto visual del juego no es la mecánica de luchar por turnos como el género indica, De todas maneras Trick & Treat es un correcto ejemplo de como aprovechar este tipo de graficas RPG y sacarle el máximo potencial, El juego tiene temática de misterio y entre mas avanzas mas interesante se vuelve descubrir el final pero, hay muchas cosas que te pueden provocar un "Game Over" así que ten cuidado. La historia: es muy intrigante y te inspira a saber qué es lo que realmente está pasando a tu alrededor, al ser un misterio el “replay value” baja considerablemente, pero al parecer en el nuevo juego con el nuevo traje; los diálogos cambian así que es un pequeño motivo para rejugarlo de nuevo. El arte del juego es muy decente y entendible no creo que haya problemas para nuevos jugadores, Al igual que el arte los personajes van de la mano; y puedo decir que las ilustraciones son muy adecuadas también los diálogos ayudan de manera obvia a ver el tipo de carácter que tiene cada personaje sumando las expresiones ilustradas tenemos un elenco pequeño con personajes muy carismáticos. El OST o Soundtrack:  estuvo muy bien, hay sonidos de ambientación que me erizaron la piel; pero eso es otra historia. Resumen: Me alegro mucho haberle dado una oportunidad a este juego; lleva al género a otro nivel, no he probado otros tipos de juegos similares así que este es mi primer RPG de este tipo, Recomiendo mucho el juego a los amantes del RPG de la vieja escuela, Y a las personas que les gusten resolver acertijos o "puzzles"; los puzzles son muy divertidos y misteriosos, así que a ver si pueden con los retos.

Graficas: 6/10 (RPG de la vieja escuela, "Retro always wins")
Historia: 6/10 (Corta pero satisfactoria.)
Personajes: 6/10 (Carismáticos y con buenas ilustraciones)
OST o Soundtrack: 8/10 (Excelente.)
Entretenimiento: 8/10 (opinión subjetiva; varía en cada jugador)
[h1]Nota Final: ★★★★★★★☆☆☆ | Bueno[/h1]

29104440.review:
This game has the Trick and treat of the tradition, instead of ‘or’ haha! (Get it?)

It certainly reminded me of the old days when I used to go trick-or-treating with my friends. Trick & Treat promises all aspects of a basic RPG game, with the promised jump scares and grim moments as stated in the warning of the game. 

However, the instructions and settings should be more accessible to the players: the only time I was able to read the instructions/Settings were in 2 single dialogues after the Intro has ended, so it would be easy to miss for those who tend to skim through dialogues.

Other than that, Trick & Treat is an enjoyable game for Halloween. ^_^

28960988.review:
I really wanted to enjoy this game. When I first saw it I thought, "What a treat." And by treat I mean treat yourself to firing this game up and giving it a whirl. I mean it, wow! I found myself a nice lil pum'kin to sit my tush upon and began playing this cute little thing! But then I almost had to stop playing at one point entirely though ((there were ghosts that appeared on screen and triggered me)). A little word of advice to the creator...
If you're going to show such images of the deceased, have a little common decency to warn the audience. That's really all I ask for. When you see something like on screen, it really can put you in the greatest of fits. I felt personally attacked at that part, and had to stop playing the game to catch my breath. 
I had mentally prepared myself to continue playing the game, and at this point, I was ready, but it had already left too sour a taste. In my mouth. I suppose because this game is free you can try it out.. but if you're even slightly sensitive to horror imagery, do. Not! I repeat: do.. not!!

一款免费的国产rpg解密游戏，有微恐怖向的元素但是真的很少，十分全年龄向，解谜也很亲切，基本答案都很浅显，忍不住跨年通关的一款游戏，一周目到真结局一小时不到，为了全结局收集和死亡结局收集折腾了快俩小时……轻微强迫的把几乎每一个像素点都看过去了！所有坑都有完美填上！爽！最终的二周目和全成就解锁只用了半小时左右，总的来说流程不长，但是故事讲的很清楚明白，像素图也实在是萌进肺里面……
结局分为九个死亡结局，一个bad end，一个normal end和一个true end，可以说没有坏结局……哪怕是bad end也像是夫妻吵架一样……
理查德真的是全游戏的精华，希望大家给他多一点爱和关怀，怂巴巴的哭包王子真的……太可爱了……
最后感谢制作组的辛苦！设定集已入！期待新作！期待夏洛特和理查德的后续发展！

28810732.review:
[b]Trick & Treat[/b] is a cute and short story about two girls having fun on Halloween. It's not your typical trick or treat night however. Filled with cute horror scenarios, funny ghosts and nice puzzling, this RPG Maker game is actually quite clever, giving the players a mix of feelings throughout the game.

Controlling a cute girl with a pumpkin in her head can lead to many things, but although some scenarios in this game are funny, others are actually intense and even worthy of any major horror game out there! But if none of this appeals to you, then you can certainly rely on extremely well design puzzles. Very interesting, random, and keep you wondering about the different book shelves, rooms and items around the curious and cursed Castle.

Although being surprisingly good, it's short. The end is fantastic, and leaves the player with a terrific feeling over Halloween, which is an absolutely perfect time to play this game.
With multiple endings, only curiosity and a good heart can lead you to the final and true ending, where friends rejoice and together with the player, unlocking artwork, outfits, curiosities and more extras gives a great meaning to a second playthrough.

A game developed by a great team dedicated to give meaning to all small things.
I wouldn't trade my 3 hours in [b]Trick & Treat[/b] for anything else. A great free game to warm any player's heart and brain cells.
7/10

28694430.review:
10/10 would break into someone's house again

But in all seriousness.

If you're someone who plays a lot of RPG Maker games, you already know the general algorithm for making horror games. This one goes apart from the rest in the sense that it defies your expectations going in; "Oh, I know how this is going to end." No. It doesn't end like all the other RPG horrors, it leaves you pleasantly surprised.

The art style is cute, too. The sound effects were... RPG Maker stock, but thankfully not overused.

The puzzles were fun! Not too challenging, but fun. I think a lot of RPG games go for difficulty nowadays rather than actual playability, and the only reason I would get stuck on a few puzzles was because my friend and I kept trying to overthink them.

And besides, it's free. Just have fun. I would have paid a little money to play this game myself. (Hey devs, hmu if you read this, I'd totally donate.)

Overall, I think it was pretty fun and cute.

[SPOILERS] Pretty sad that John and Richard weren't gay tho :(

Still.

I promise, this game is more fun than you might think.

28079811.review:
[h1]Trick & Treat : Halloween at its cutest.[/h1]

Charlotte (a powerfull witch) and Amelia (her maid) went trick or treat during the Halloween eve, so on the hunt for candy they find a "cursed" mansion.
As soon as they enter the mansion they are welcomed by the host of the mansion, and after a brief conversation the host leaves, Charlotte would not be denied her candy, so she does the most reasonable thing: chace the cheap host and claim her candy.
The player takes control of Amelia, the naive maid with little to none outside world experience and its up to her to find Charlotte and take all the candy you can find, but be aware for the mansion hides many traps so will have to use your wits to survive.


This game is the standard rpg, this means the player can interact with objects, however in this game there is no combat, but you can still die in some nasty ways.

In conclusion: Trick and Treat is a light-hearted rpg game, props to the dev for the artwork and setting of the game.

27541540.review:
游戏评价：差强人意（6/10）
通关时间：2小时（不算二周目）
适合人群：想要找点乐趣也喜欢玩RPG、或解密小游戏的人
恐怖要素：含JUMP SCARE，但不吓人

游戏立绘作为小作坊已经是不错的了，因为使用的制作工具是RPGMaker，因此就结论而言已经算是用心了。音效因为是免费素材的所以也没啥好点评的。
问题在于“bug多”：关卡设计有问题、音效会莫名其妙断断续续起来（出bug时还会不停循环，如果你触发了开门声，那么这个开门声很可能会在触发bug时持续到你游戏退出为止，先说明绝对不是我的配置问题）
关卡设计问题我贴在讨论版了，有一定剧透，在涉及到2个谜题解不开（或多结论）的时候可以看看下面的链接：
http://steamcommunity.com/app/497640/discussions/0/154641879454539695/

游戏结局有点出乎意料，打二周目的时候有些对话的改变也透露出了一些设定，知道这些的话其实还是觉得挺有趣（或新奇）的，如果仔细一想会发现和一周目部分细节的关联。
有种不是太理想的感觉。游戏的作者偏向甜蜜剧情走向，甚至以此规定结局类型——对我这种有时候也想看看忍心拒绝但最后走向完美结局的人来说还是很遗憾的；另一方面就是关卡设计BUG让我有点不爽，关卡设计的漏洞害我卡关半天（具体情况见上方链接），否则我能评8/10。

有空闲时间想玩玩小型RPG的话可以试试这款游戏，解密难度不算高，但也要认真一点想。（不包括那些非常影响体验的关卡设计漏洞！）而且是免费的。

【如果你在一周目的时候非常小心的收集了所有的要素，并且那瓶药一直没有用，并注意分开存档（但不要像某存档狂魔把所有存档存成1个时间节点），那么在2周目开始一段时间后，你就能拿到个新成就并且此时将只剩下1个成就。这时候再建议返回标题画面然后去看官方给的“成就说明”，基本就能很方便的拿到全成就了。但要注意的是一周目结尾动画不能跳。】

26674111.review:
A lovely little tribute to small, RPG-maker horror titles like The Witch's House, Mad Father, and Ib (pronunced "Eve"). I recommend it, if you have about an hour of free time and feel in a Halloween festive mood.

Pros: [list]
[*]Free-to-Play
[*]Prequel in Development
[*]Short length for those who want an easy playthrough. Not difficult compared to Witch's House.
[*]Subtle to not-so-subtle scares
[*]Respectable art and sprite animation
[*]If you've played things like Witch's House, then you'll get a lot of the jokes and meta humour.
[*]Really liked the True ending.
[*]Extras post-game. Also an optional art book.
[/list]
Cons (or Meh Points):[list]
[*]Short length for those who want more content.
[*]True ending is a nice respectable end. However, the normal ending doesn't feel unique on it's own.
[/list]
Summary: Worth playing as a first step towards masterpieces like "Witch's House". Looking forward to future projects from Rabbiton studio.

Similar Game Recommendations (On Steam): [list]
[*]Freebirds Games- To the Moon (Sequels being produced)
[*]Rabbiton Studio- The Witch's Tea Party (forthcoming)
[*]Mad Father- If you want something dark. Witch's House can be found off Steam, but might be coming to Steam eventually. 
[/list]
Thanks for Reading ~RB

26492442.review:
А вы знали, что конфеты не только вкусны, но и опасны для жизни? 

Как-то раз на Хэллоуин одна взбалмошная ведьма и её очаровательная помощница пошли собирать конфеты. Много-много конфет! Потому что конфеты ведьма любила, а ещё она любила всяческие розыгрыши, поэтому решила немного припугнуть своих соседей, что жили в замке неподалёку. Но что-то пошло не так: ведьма убежала раздавать тумаки негостеприимным хозяевам, а её преданная служанка осталась топтаться в холле, где по красному чавкающему ковру вальсировали призраки, у входа мяукали грациозные кошачьи статуи, а по лестницам неспешно разгуливали привидения…

Игровой процесс не требует от игрока невозможного: пока госпожа ведьма бегает по замку в поисках хозяев, вы осматриваете окружающие предметы, обшариваете местные бочки и горшки в поисках желанных конфет, попутно решая загадки и проблемы местных обитателей. Некоторые бочки могут взрываться и отнимать у героини очки здоровья, но разве это остановит храбрую похитительницу конфет? Загадки разные, от "принеси-подай" до марафонского забега на время.

Игра проходится за 3-4 часа на два раза, если вы хотите открыть все картинки и получить все достижения. Картинки нарисованы "на коленке", но в этом есть какая-то изюминка.

Удивительное дело, но в этой небольшой игре довольно много концовок. Чтобы получить доступ до меню Экстра, нужно завершить игру с настоящей или нормальной концовкой.  Почаще сохраняйтесь, особенно ближе к финалу, чтобы перезапустить игру и переиграть события по-другому. Экстра довольно забавная. Обязательно перепробуйте все возможные опции и пройдитесь по книжным стеллажам, чтобы узнать много нового о героях. Там же можно найти подсказки, если вы пропустили какую-то плохую концовку. Спешу заметить, что в этой игре их девять (!), но никаких достижений вам за них не дадут. При повторном прохождении некоторые диалоги и вещи будут слегка изменены. 

Я всячески рекомендую данную игру к прохождению, потому что она по-настоящему удивительная. И БЕСПЛАТНАЯ. Очень странно, учитывая, сколько позитива она может вам подарить. Не ждите следующего Хэллоуина, а бегите играть прямо сейчас!

26471502.review:
刷了三个结局，感觉能来写些什么了。
万圣节的时候下载玩的，游戏做的不错，而且是免费的，就这点而言非常值得一玩。要说归类的话应该能归在像素解谜类。


---------以下内容开始无敌叨叨，不喜请绕。叨叨内容，大概是与几款(玩过的好玩的)类似的小游戏对比一下-----------
------------------------------------------顺便安利一点小游戏-------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------所有的评价出于个人感受，如有其他意见欢迎探讨。-------------------------------

可能这类游戏相似点比较多，看到视屏简介的时候就同时联想到很多这样的小游戏。[魔女之家]、[深海少女]、[ib美术馆]。
还有因为体力回复太慢而没有玩下去的[捉迷藏]。
当然也有种草了还没玩的。[尸体派对]、[噩梦乐园]、[]如果有玩过的大神求推荐一下。

说实话刚打开游戏的时候，我想到的是[魔女之家]。一开始画面的小草坪和魔女之家刚开始的背景，迷之一毛一样。当然继续玩下去以后还是差别挺大的。

            就这四款游戏对比一下的话：
>惊悚程度：
  T&T：T&T不算特别恐怖的，恐怖点比较少。但是也正因如此，特别容易让人放松警惕。追逐战方面大可放心，几乎没有追逐战。不喜欢追逐战的朋友可以直接入这个了。
  魔女：要说的话魔女应该是这几个里面最恐怖的。极其频繁的追逐战，说实话长时间玩的话，精神会很疲劳。但是真的很好玩，玩起来只要不卡关几乎放不下来。当然卡关的话就没办法了……
  深海：可能因为画面灰暗，深海全程给人一种很压抑的感觉，包括最后结局也是（这个后面再说）。同时因为画面灰暗，所以一玩起来就觉得精神很紧张。
  Ib：ib是我第一个玩的这类游戏，可以说是种草作。画面和音效的配合很棒，总体程度能说是适中，适合大部分人玩。
                    【魔女＞深海＞ib＞T&T】

>剧情：
  T&T：剧情方面感觉一般。主线是收集糖果（好像影响结局）
  魔女：魔女的剧情其实也不错的，但是因为有ib的三条人物线，比较一下就略微逊色了。
  深海：感觉剧情设计的有点复杂，其实结局看了三遍才看懂。
  ib：ib的剧情线超级庞大！三条人物线和很多场景，感觉这个游戏最值得玩的地方就是剧情，值得琢磨。
                     【ib＞魔女＞深海＞T&T】

>难度：
  T&T：总体难度一般，我是三个晚上的时间打下一周目的。卡关卡过两次。
  魔女：解谜的地方有些感觉还挺难的。卡关一卡起来直接想摔手机……
  深海：别的不多说，这个游戏，蠢比的我一度因为过不去第一个点，而导致删了又装装了又删……
  Ib：ib玩得比较早，一周目的时候在上课，大概一天半小时左右，断断续续玩了三个礼拜。卡关的情况不记得了，难度应该还可以。
                      【魔女＞深海＞Ib＞T&T】

>特色：
  T&T：这个游戏可以集卡！这个游戏可以收集成就！反正因为这一点我就已经种草这个游戏了←
  魔女：魔女的特色是？？追逐战？？
  深海：深海的音乐很好听，很清脆的感觉；画面也很好看。
  ib：人物和剧情的设定吧。P站微博上还有很多同人图



总结一下自己叨叨了那么久的东西
追求恐怖的话可以玩魔女，追求剧情的话可以玩ib，追求画风就是深海，成就控就是T&T←



大概写了这些，要去上课了。第一次写测评有些小激动。总之回来想到什么的话再补吧）

26439976.review:
Sinceramente, cuando comencé a jugar, no entendía muy bien que estaba pasando, la historia no tenía ningún sentido y los personajes no me caían nada bien. Charlotte, me parecía arrogante y Amelia me parecía una especia de sumisa tonta. Nada es lo que parece y no se puede criticar u opinar si no lo has terminado de todas las formas posibles.

Ahora que me lo he pasado 4 veces para saber todos los posibles finales y conseguir todos los logros, veo que es un juego muy recomendable, sobre todo por la historia. Se nota que los creadores han estado pensando mucho en su desarrollo.

Por otra parte, no me gustó mucho que los controles fuesen las flechas de dirección y no ASDW, pero cuando llevas un rato te acostumbras y no entiendo para que sirve tener nivel, HP y los MP, supongo que sería para despistar al jugador, al fin y al cabo, es lo que hacen en todo el juego. Así que, mi enhorabuena a todo el equipo detrás del juego y esperemos que haya más, historias que dan un giro y no es lo que parece, merecen la pena.

10/10

给使用XBOX手柄的玩家

游戏中使用的是六键手柄（ABC XYZ LR），而且手柄按键和选项似乎颠倒了？

Button1~10 对应的 XBOX 手柄按键：
Button1 —— A
Button2 —— B
Button3 —— X
Button4 —— Y
Button5 —— LB
Button6 —— RB
Button7 —— BACK
Button8 —— SELECT
Button9、Button10 —— 似乎没有对应按键

Button1~10的选项（ABC XYZ LR）对应的游戏菜单：
A —— 跑
B —— 呼出菜单/取消
C —— 调查/确定
X、Y、Z、L、R —— 似乎并没有什么用

26366869.review:
一款短小精悍却诚意满满的国产独立小游戏，两对主仆之间的爱的大冒险。

很好地将恐怖与温情结合在了一起，在这一点的处理上上要比我接下来将要介绍的PRICE好得多。

游玩上保留了RPG类恐怖游戏一贯的风格，无论是音乐还是画面转换的细节都体现的很好。没有突然的惊吓，恐怖元素体现在各个细节的处理上，让你细思恐极。

解谜元素稍微有点难度，各个环节之间的连接缺少点提示，很容易让人断线。所以还是稍微需要一点记忆力和耐心的。

总之是一款非常nice的游戏，在万圣节即将到来之际，将它奉献给大家。

26311177.review:
作为免费游戏来说的话游戏乐趣非常不错，剧情也很简单。
一周目大概一个半小时通关，并没有拿到全成就。
说实话，一周目的时候我非常兴致勃勃。因为画面和游戏本身的类型是我所喜欢的类型。这个解谜的难度也并不是很大，计时的环节看起来也只是为了增加紧张感。同时我也发现这个游戏很多不足的地方，首先是剧情上的薄弱。其次是如果提前拿到没有提示的道具很容易造成卡关，好像只能按照攻略那样按顺序拿到东西你才能懂的你接下来应该做什么，这部分是没有必要的游戏难度。然后就是地图的设计太简单，并且有很多没有意义的伏笔，像是为了增添恐怖气氛特意添上去的。
作为一个喜欢收集成就的玩家，我不得不说我很不高兴，因为我只玩了一遍但我没有打到真结局，甚至于我看了作者小屋的提示后我依然不知道怎么样能打到真结局。并且，我对玩这个游戏第二遍一点兴趣都没有。
 
打分的话6/10吧。因为这个游戏虽然有趣，但对我来说有趣的程度仅仅只能玩一遍。甚至于收集成就都没能让我有动力玩第二遍。

26299161.review:
《Trick & Treat》，也就是“既要糖果也要捣蛋”。讲述的是万圣节前夜，两名女嫌疑犯（此处应有马赛克）摸黑闯进了一所森林中的宅邸，在里面横行霸道四处搜刮物资的故事。据不愿透露姓名的坐在厅堂两边的贝斯特小姐所说，两名女子手中均拖着一个白色的大布袋，跟某位钻烟囱的老人不同的是，她们的布袋里装满的，全是顺来的糖果。

游戏流程大概是2个小时左右。既然是恐怖解谜，自然也有“震你一下要素”——即突然闪现的恐怖画面。有心脏病史的人建议最好绕道而行。对一般人来说，这个游戏的恐怖程度实在是很低，就算是害怕恐怖游戏的人也毫无压力。作为一个游戏难度也很低，没有紧张刺激的追逐战，最多也就是给个倒计时而已，不用担心，时限都给得十分宽裕。总的来说是个轻松愉快的小游戏。

画风充满了个人制作的粗糙感，整个游戏一共有三种画风，一种是像素风的行走图，一种是立绘，一种是厚涂的CG。我个人来说还挺喜欢这种感觉的，免费独立游戏都差不多是这种感觉，久而久之开始觉得，这种跟精美无缘的游戏美术，正是象征着（绝大多数情况下）作者独自一人挑起了整个游戏的所有制作的重担，让人感受到满满的“一个人制作”氛围（当然也有插画家自己就是作者的特殊情况）。

故事虽然简短不过很有意思，特别是最后，突然来了个大爆点。游戏中也埋了不少伏笔，不过都很隐晦，等到二周目的时候你会突然发现“啊，原来这里是在暗示那个啊。”

游戏中有个很有意思的设定，在房间A看隔壁房间B的时候，可以看到房间B血迹斑斑。但是到了房间B时却发现里面很干净，反而是隔壁的房间A充满鲜血。

这个不是用来吓阿梅利亚而是来吓玩家的吧w

[h1]童话[/h1]

仔细观察会发现，这个游戏中有很多童话要素。

比如说四个洋娃娃，就是代表着四个童话故事。

最明显的应该是蓝色洋娃娃的房间，暗示着《蓝胡子》。

其余的就只能靠只言片语来猜了……

· 紫色洋娃娃那个跳舞跳到死的剧情让人想起了《白雪公主》。

· 红色洋娃娃房间里有很多士兵，很像是《胡桃夹子》里的场景。

· 绿色洋娃娃房间里的有一部纺车，很多童话都出现过纺车，最出名的是《睡美人》，不过单凭这一点还是无法确定。只有这个真的是举双手投降了。

停止时间的兔子那里就更明显啦，是《爱丽丝漫游仙境》。

顺带一提，虽然跟童话没什么关系“墙壁里埋藏着真相”这句话让我想起了金田一少年事件簿。

[h1]结语[/h1]

总的来说，是一部有点意思的恐怖解谜小游戏，故事到了结局会让人不禁笑出声来，主角的南瓜服饰看起来也很好玩，万圣节气氛浓厚，非常适合在临近万圣节的现在玩一玩。

解谜难度很低，如果卡关了的话就回头去调查所有能调查的东西吧！

最大的难点可能是隐藏房间，它有两个解锁前置条件比较坑，如果实在找不到的话，可以去看一看官方的攻略。

全成就不难，在通关的时候就可以几乎拿到所有成就了（因为这个游戏有二周目才能解锁的成就），如果你喜欢挑战全成就的话，这个游戏也是非常推荐的。

二周目其实并没有太多的新要素，我觉得是可有可无的。如果想要再去挖掘一下埋藏的伏笔以及解锁二周目相册的话倒是很建议再玩一次，不然的话其实也没什么必要。

一共有9个死亡结局、1个坏结局、1个真结局（包含两个微妙差别的分歧）和1个普通结局。有兴趣的话可以去收集一下结局。游戏很贴心的在通关过后解锁了一个特殊的房间，在房间内有提到所有结局的触发方法。

[spoiler]在挑战全死亡结局的过程中，还触发了阿梅利亚对全BE收集玩家的怨念CG“……就那么希望我死掉吗？”

（因为那个地方不是故意的话真的挺难死的w）[/spoiler]

正好临近万圣节，不妨花两个小时玩一玩这个有趣的万圣节小游戏吧！

这个免费小游戏正好可以抚慰一下被万圣节[strike]抢钱活动[/strike]特惠所袭击的可怜的小钱包！

PS:
[h1]按F12会返回标题画面[/h1]
我玩的时候家里那只小猫一直在键盘上踩来踩去，被它按了好几次F12了(´；ω；｀)

[b]Trick & Treat[/b] is a short RPGMaker game in which you help a pumpkin girl find her friend during a little trick-or-treating mishap. This is a puzzle, horror game.
You are Amelia, the maid of Charlotte and you two have gone out on halloween to trick or treat, but the town seems scary so you deside to go to a castle up north.

I had a problem with this game before since something made the acheivements not work the first time I installed it so I uninstalled it to install it again, but it would not download the update. Somehow it got fixed like 3 days later.

Have fun, enjoy and give me the candy :)

26236980.review:
This was a cute one. Lighthearted with small bits of tensions scattered throughout. I'm going to risk putting my foot in my mouth, however, and say that it seems obvious that the devs that worked on this are new at this. That being said, the work was good for what it was marketed as: a short, puzzle-laden, third-person walking sim with a story behind it. However, there are some aspects that could use improvement...

  * Spelling mistakes were enough at times to break immersion ("selves" instead of "shelves" in the Library, for example).

  * Artwork was simple, but the lines were somewhat grainy. Voxels are good for ingame avatars when solving puzzles, but when I'm looking at the characters interacting with one another in Story Mode, I want to have the characters leap off the screen at me. They don't do that when you can see the voxels onscreen that define the boundaries of the drawing that make up the character onscreen.

Other than that, it was cute, it occupied my time (which was what I was looking for), and it put a smile on my face...not something many games can do. 6 + 1 (For Smile)/10 - Would play sequel.

26174058.review:
This game wasn't really horrorifying which was good for me, because I'm terrible with jumpscares. 

Music: 7/10 
Ominous? Yep. Cute? You got it. Overall great? Absolutely.
I didn't really find the music too repetitive because there were so many rooms with different themes/songs for each one. The music really got me in the dungeon, where it really set a creepy theme. 

Story: 9/10 
I actually thought that the story would be more cute than spooky. I was wrong! It's equally both. 
There's parts in the game that were a lot scarier than I thought it'd be. (Chopping a skeleton's head off? What? A bear rug that can bite?! Oh dear!) But the ending was very cute and I really like the twist. 

Art: 7/10
The CGs were a bit "blurry", but that's probably the style. otherwise, the art is quite cutesy and is enjoyable.

Would I recommend this game? Yes. It's great, and only takes around an hour and 10 minutes, in my case at least. Just beware of the bad ends.

Disliked:
Nothing. It was a good sized game. I love that it's free! Wouldn't mind paying for it if it wasn't. The only thing I ask for, is a  part 2!

Solo puedo decir... ME ENCANTO. Pero lamentablemente tiene sus pros y sus contras.

Pros:
-Musica muy buena (pero no la mejor lamentablemente)
-Personajes bien hechos
-Historia interesante
-Diseño 2D (Mi favorito dentro de los videojuegos)
-Adaptacion de la historia a lo que "Ya sabes" (Si lo digo seria un spoiler total)

Contras:
-Dialogos pobres
-Acertijos muy faciles
-Bastante corto (exactamente me tomo 45 minutos en terminarlo todo)

No es el juego perfecto, pero como soy un amante de los juegos en 2D lo disfrute mucho, aunque fuera poco. Recomendado para los amantes del RPG y el 2D. Cabe aclarar que no encontraras mucho en este juego.

25928442.review:
[h1]🎃☆🎃☆🎃☆🎃☆🎃☆🎃☆🎃☆🎃☆🎃☆🎃☆🎃☆🎃☆🎃☆🎃☆🎃☆🎃[/h1]

This is such a [b]cute and fun[/b] little Halloween-themed game. I really like the format which combines [b]traditional RPGs[/b] with a bit of a [b]choose-your-own-adventure[/b] element. It's a short game, but you can tell that plenty of thought and care has been put into all the little details. The writing is believable and entertaining, the [b]spooky atmosphere[/b] is well crafted, and the little extras really make the game feel fleshed out despite its length. There's even an unlockable outfit, and it actually changes the narrative a little bit!

I really liked the [b]pixel art[/b], especially for our main character in her pumpkin outfit. I would love to see how the game would look with similarly pixel-styled text boxes and full character illustrations, and I think the achievements could benefit from being made in a pixel art style as well, but overall I did enjoy the art style as a whole.

The main thing I'd like to express about this little game is the character of it. It's successfully [b]immersive[/b], and I found myself finishing it with great affection for the characters and the story. [b]Trick & Treat[/b] combines a genuine [b]eerie feeling[/b] with some [b]well-placed humour[/b], and I really enjoyed playing it. ☆ﾟ.*･｡ﾟ

25871223.review:
[h1]Achievement & Treat[/h1]

"Trick & Treat" is a cute, albeit short Halloween-themed RPGmaker game. It wasn't scary at all for me (honestly), but maybe that's just me. I can't say much without spoiling the story so this will be a short sort of a "thank you" review. Your goal is to collect candy and solve puzzles. You can try solving them on your own. If don't want to do that or simply get stuck you can check out the walkthrough and achievement guide that helped me complete the game. I don't think "Trick & Treat" should be free as it was interesting and I didn't find any glitches or cons at all. Perfect for achievement hunters (no pun intended xD) or just anyone who likes free and/or RPG games. Overall I can easily give it a 10/10 especially because it is free.

A fun, well done Halloween themed game!
Game takes less than two hours to complete, but a bit more if you get stuck. A couple of the riddles didn't make complete sense to me, but no real complaints. There are plenty of save points, and it's really quick to restart when you select something that gives you a bad ending!
The game had a fair amount of work put into it, and a few in-game secrets that are just for fun.
I'd definitely recommend this game to anyone looking for a fun mystery & puzzle game with a bit of RPG mixed in!

25832602.review:
If you're looking for another RPG maker game to add to your library then this would be a great addition.

Sprite work/Graphics:
First off I'd like to say I really enjoyed the character sprites. I always appreciate good sprite work and it's certainly present here, not to mention there's plenty of original item sprites and backgrounds from what I can tell.
I'm not super familar with all the DLC packs for every version of RPG maker, but I know for a fact there's plenty of original work here.
There were a few choices I felt were a tad odd, such as the icon for the dirty table cloth being a worn out cloak, but it wasn't enough to make me neglect all the GOOD choices that were made.

Sound: 
The music was fitting throughout and I enjoyed the switch between silence and sound. The music that went along with the more lighthearted moments such as the ending was pleasing to hear as well. Also, I always enjoy when RPG maker games have sound effects for foot steps, and there was a nice variety here too. 

Story:
Obviously, do not expect 20, 10 or even 5 hour's worth of game play from this. This is a short, sweet little game to take about an hour or so of your time.
Now, of course that isn't a bad thing. Some things are better being short and simple. I just think it's worth mentioning so you don't have heighted expectations for a lenghty game.
The story as I put it, was short and sweet. I won't go into great detail since I want this to be spoiler-free, but I really enjoyed the ending the most out of it. Which to be honest, is where most of the story takes place. You find some clues here and there, but all the real interactions take place at the end.

Biggest Complaint:
I didn't really understand the point of typing in the answers for getting into the dining room and a couple other spots? I was really confused, and then eventually realized it had no meaning. At least... I think. 
I know in the bonus room you can say PUMPKIN at one of the spots to get a Dead End ending, but other than that, I don't get it. I felt like I should have needed to find a hint somewhere and actually give an answer, or this should have just been removed altogether.
I feel like this is more of a personal complaint, rather than a real flaw. And I apologize if I'm just missing something and there is more to it than I'm thinking. 

Overall:
I 100% recommend this if you're looking for something cute to get into the spirit of Halloween, and/or if you just want another nice RPG maker game with some pretty appealing art.
Also it's good to note, it's FREE. 
So there's no reason to not try.
I highly recommend supporting more creators out there like this, who are willing to put decent amounts of work into a game and not ask any money for it.

In conclusion, keep up the good work and emprovement for the next game you'll put out.

25790187.review:
1. 虽然标签里有微恐血腥，但实际是很温暖可爱的治愈风格（幽灵有点小萌~）
2. 没有一惊一乍的吓人元素，（起码在承受范围内）
    也没有揪心的追逐赛，（只想安安静静玩解谜的手残表示很欣慰。）
    取而代之的限时任务很轻松~
3. 谜题不难，靠基本法就行（搜刮每一寸土地，试验每一个道具wwwww）
    此外谜题是循序渐进的，一个承接另一个，赞！（记性不好的表示，谜题太分散容易犯路痴和道具对不上号。。）
4. 道具场景做的很用心，很小巧精致（不要被“简陋”的像素封皮骗了OTL），艺术册已入，期待更多系列作品！！
5. 剧情还在探索中（坚持不看剧透），首次通关只是normal end但。。关于爱的话题，有点悲伤。。
    好像是个没有坏蛋的故事哦

25724464.review: I like this game. 虽然叫微恐怖但剧情轻松有趣，游戏的流程虽不长，却比较紧凑，中间没有太多无谓的跑动；谜题部分难度适中，需要稍微思考但不会太难，即使不想解谜多试几次也不会卡关。人物设计很可爱，音乐也很应景，但感觉音乐声音偏小，为了烘托气氛可以再优化一下。很多游戏喜欢在一闪而过的吓人场景加上恶心的音效（个人比较反感那种做法，虽然吓起人来屡试不爽），本作没有那样做，这是我喜欢的地方。最后感觉夏洛特小姐的剧情应该可以开发一下，期待后续。（其他玩家不要在评价里剧透和写攻略啊，剧透一时爽，xxxxx）

25722762.review:
pros:
- visually appealing with cute art 
- interesting story
- nice music that isn't distracting or obnoxious and matches scenes well
- more than one possible ending
- strikes the perfect balance between being spooky and light-hearted
- likable characters with charming personalities/interactions, including npcs
- multi-dimensional: solve puzzles, play a mini-game, explore the mansion and unravel a mystery, rescue mission to save your friend, etc
- possibility to earn achievements
- halloween and fairytale themes throughout

cons:
- short gameplay
- small map. the game pretty much takes place entirely inside the mansion, which is large (5F if you include the dungeon) but is still just one place. the story still feels complete, but it would be cool if we could explore different areas more, even if it were just the house we live in at the very beginning
- puzzles are interesting but not particularly challenging


You can tell that the developer put a lot of care and effort into this game and it is very enjoyable to play- to the point that I immediately tried getting a different ending after finishing my first one. In my opinion, the fact that this game is free is reason enough to overlook and even justify the cons I listed. I really recommend giving this game a chance!
